children.name: Introduction
Monitor and Analyze your Cycle Times

blocks.text: This Dashboard focuses on the overall end-to-end time of a standard Invoice-to-Cash process. It additionally shows the cycle time for various portions of the process (subprocess cycle time).  Such breakdown of cycle times can be used to identify bottlenecks in your process.
Page 1 - Overview: Key metrics to get a picture of the health of Invoice-to-Cash cycle time.
Page 2 - Deep Dive: Deep dive into further analysis of your cycle time.
Page 3  - Case Details: A list of Cases - and Invoice details in order to identify root causes.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
Kindly provide feedback on the Dashboard, this will aid us in enhancing its functionality.

children.name: Overview
AVG Cycle Time for Late Payments
children.description: Average Cycle Time of all Invoices from Posting to Clearing after their Due Date was reached (Late Payments)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Due Date passed')))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE event_name Matches ('Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
    AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date")

children.name: Rate of Cases executed in a given timeframe
children.description: Percentage of Cases being executed in a pre-defined timeframe. The Timeframe is set to 14 Days as default but can be updated in 'Metrics'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE (SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
        	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
        	< DURATION '14days') 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for Clearing Invoices
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Posting to Clearing an Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "event_name" MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: AVG Cycle Time from Invoice Creation to Posting
children.description: Average Cycle Time from the point an Invoice was created until it got posted.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice')))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for On-Time Payments
children.description: Average Cycle Time of all Invoices from Posting to Clearing before their Due Date was reached (On-Time Payments)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

children.name: AVG Cycle Time to release Dunning Block
children.description: Average Cycle Time after a Dunning Block was posted until the Dunning Block was removed

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Remove Dunning Block'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Set Dunning Block')))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Cycle Time Process Discovery
Deep Dive
AVG Cycle Time Over over Months
children.description: Average Cycle Time for all Cleared Invoices, which got posted in a specific Month

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "Invoice Posting Date",
        
    AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
    - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "Average Cycle Time"
        	
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Post Invoice'~>'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

children.name: AVG Cycle Time and Number of Invoices grouped by Document Type
children.description: Average Cycle Time of all posted Invoices grouped by their Document Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT("case_id") AS "# No of Invoices",
    AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) * -1 AS "Average Cycle Time",
	"Inv. Document Type Text" AS "Document Type" 

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Inv. Document Type Text" IS NOT NULL 
AND EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create Invoice' ~> 'Post Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 15

children.name: Sub Process Cycle Time Analysis by Company Name
children.description: The table shows the Average Cycle Times between some important events from Posting to Clearing an Invoice

columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Cycle time from Posting to Clearing Invoice
Cycle Time from Goods Receipt to Posting Invoice
Cycle time from Payment Run Proposal to Clearing Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company",
    COUNT("case_id") AS "Number of Invoices",
    
   SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Total Invoice Value",


	AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Clear Invoice')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Post Invoice')) ))
	) AS "Cycle time from Posting to Clearing Invoice",
 
 	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Remove Dunning Block'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) 
        AS "Payment Release Block Time"

FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "Inv. Company Code Text" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: AVG Cycle Time to clear Invoices
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Posting an Invoice to Clearing it

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "event_name" MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for On-Time Payments grouped by Invoice Company Code
children.description: Average Cycle Time for all Invoices paid before their Due Date was reached

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Due Date passed')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Average Cycle Time",
  "Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
  AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" > "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
  AND  "Inv. Company Code Text" IS NOT NULL
  )
GROUP BY  2
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for Late Payments grouped by Inv. Company
children.description: Average Cycle Time for all Invoices paid after their Due Date was reached

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Due Date passed')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Average Cycle Time",
  "Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
  AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
  AND  "Inv. Company Code Text" IS NOT NULL
  )
GROUP BY  2
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for Late Payments grouped by Document Type
children.description: Average Cycle Time of all posted and cleared Invoices being paid after their Due Date, grouped by their Document Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Due Date passed')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Average Cycle Time",
  "Inv. Document Type Text" AS "Document Type"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
  AND (
    "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
  )
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for On-Time Payments grouped by Document Type
children.description: Average Cycle Time of all posted and cleared Invoices, which have been paid before their Due Date grouped by their Document Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Average Payment Time",
  "Inv. Document Type Text" AS "Document Type"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
  AND (
    "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
  )
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for Late Payments
children.description: Average Payment Cycle Time of invoices with Payments after reaching the Due Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Due Date passed')))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE event_name Matches ('Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
    AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date")

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for On-Time Payments
children.description: Average Cycle Time of all invoices from Posting to Clearing before their Due Date was reached (On-Time Payments)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

children.name: AVG Cycle Time from Creation to Clearing Invoices
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Creating an Invoice to Clearing it

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "event_name" MATCHES ('Create Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: AVG Cycle Time from Invoice posting to clearing

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE event_name Matches ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
    AND ("Inv. Posting Document Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date")

children.name: Rate of Cases executed in a given timeframe (14 Days)
children.description: Percentage of Cases being executed in a pre-defined timeframe. The Timeframe is set to 14 Days as default but can be updated in 'Metrics'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE (SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
        	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
        	< DURATION '14days') 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Case Details
Invoice Details
children.description: This table shows all Invoices and their related information (to sort or export them)

columnConfigurations.columnName: Last Inv. Item Clearing Entry Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT
 "Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Document Number"
,"Inv. Company Code"
,"Inv. Fiscal Year"

--  all date fields
,"Inv. Date" AS "Invoice Receipt Date"
,"Inv. Posting Document Date" AS "Posting Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Entry Date" AS "Clearing Entry Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" AS "Clearing Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Due Date 1" AS "CD Due Date 1"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Due Date 2" AS "CD Due Date 2"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date" AS "Due Date"

-- aggregated KPIs
,AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Total Cycle Time"
,AVG("Inv. Posting Document Date" - "Inv. Date") AS "Avg Cycle Time Invoice Receipt to Posting"
,AVG("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" - "Inv. Posting Document Date") AS "Avg Cycle Time Posting to Clearing"
,AVG("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" - "Last Inv. Item Due Date") AS "No. of Days Paid Late"

FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 3 desc NULLS LAST
LIMIT 100
